creditline: Bequest of Virginia Doneghy, by exchange
description: fully beaded tall boots with American flag, morning star, geometric designs on blue ground; design of boot is mirrored on the other; colors are blue, red, green and design is created all in small glass beads, vertical row of brass buttons on outside of leg, not functional; vertical opening in boot on outside of leg tied with three leather ties; red wool covered boot forms tacked into boots; raw leather sole; .1 is a matching dress
title: Pair of boot moccasins
